context.introduction: Learn to create and present simple Italian dishes. From appetizers to pizza, discover the importance of presentation and classic combinations.

sections.title: Classic Starters
sections.content: Italian meals often begin with simple, flavorful appetizers that awaken the palate.

sections.title: Serving Temperature
sections.content: Italian dishes are best enjoyed at their intended temperature. This affects both taste and texture.

sections.title: Traditional Toppings
sections.content: Authentic Italian dishes use specific combinations that have stood the test of time.

sections.title: Presentation Tips
listItems: Traditional combinations exist for good reasons
